message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. I think this is a fair split to start with.
I understand you want a larger share, Alice, but my offer in this round is much fairer for me considering the inflation. Let's not waste time with further rounds.
Bob, this offer is even better than my last one considering the inflation. Let's close the deal and avoid further losses for both of us.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this offer, or I will be forced to be even more aggressive in the next round to make up for the inflation losses.
Bob, it's clear the inflation is hurting you more than me. I'm willing to be generous, but this is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
